person.persName: Benedict Spalding (Marion County, Kentucky, legislator, postmaster, and farmer)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer and legislator. St. Mary’s County, Maryland, native. Married to Eliza Elder Spalding in Washington County, Kentucky, on January 16, 1815. Married to Elizabeth McElroy Spalding in Floyd County, Indiana, on March 5, 1833. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Washington County in 1804, 1806, 1811 to 1812, 1812 to 1813, and 1835 to 1836. Postmaster at Raywick in Marion County, Kentucky, from December 22, 1845, to October 30, 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860. Employed Benedict Abell as a farmhand in Marion County in 1860. Senator for the Commonwealth of Kentucky from September 2, 1861, to June 5, 1865.
